snippet.title: 7 Wonders Ancient Alien Makeover - Game Highlights
snippet.description:
Visit our website to play our Free Arcade games and earn Cloud Points! 
http://Cloud9Clicks.com

Like our videos and follow us on Facebook & Twitter!
http://youtube.com/cloud9clicks
http://facebook.com/cloud9clicks
http://twitter.com/cloud9clicks

Game Highlights: 7 Wonders Ancient Alien Makeover

4 Difficulty Levels
Match 3 Gameplay
Play with or without a Timer
Unlockable Power-Ups
Earn Achievements
Build Wonders
Play Mini Games
Decorate Your Village

Game Description

Construct exciting new wonders with the help of advanced alien technology in 7 wonders: Ancient Alien Makeover! Match 3 your way to success as you build-up your arsenal of power-ups and gain the resources to construct the wonders of the world and even your very own village. A new experience awaits you in this fantastic Match 3 game!

Build your own village
New alien technology
Earn extraordinary power-ups

System Requirements

OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8
CPU: 2.0 GHz
RAM: 1024 MB
DirectX: 9.0
HD: 267 MB

Freesound.org License Attributions:
http://www.freesound.org/people/THE_bizniss/sounds/39562/
http://www.freesound.org/people/DirtyJewbs/sounds/159392/
http://www.freesound.org/people/suonho/sounds/4013/
